statement.p: Priya is making candles in the shape of a cylinder. She needs to determine how many cubic centimeters of wax she needs. (Use the \displaystyle\pi button in your computation. Round to significant figures, as appropriate.)
If the radius of the candle is 5.0 cm and the height of the candle is 7.0 cm
(a) How much wax is needed for one candle?
(b) How much wax is needed for 20 candles?
(c) If wax is sold in cubic meters, how many completecandles can be made with 1 cubic meter of wax?
